Title: Allows MTA to establish discount fares for full-time undergraduate students
Summary: Establishes a discount fare rate of no less than 25% for full-time undergraduate students attending an accredited college who utilize the New York city transit system, including railroad, subway and/or omnibus services.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to rates of fare on the Metropolitan Transportation Authority
